title: What is the possibility of a newly married couple to get Canada immigration when they both have 16 years of education but have only 8,940 CAD? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check your eligibility for Express Entry on this page of the Immigration Canada website. This questionnaire only asks about the absolute minimum requirements to qualify. Do you want to come to Canada as a skilled immigrant? You’ll see that one of the questions is about finances. If you don’t have enough, the program will tell you that you are not eligible. This requirement to have enough money to support yourselves in Canada as new immigrants is mandatory. It is one of the basic requirements. New immigrants to Canada do not qualify for any government support. It can take time to settle in a new country and find work, so bringing savings to support yourself during that time is essential. Immigrants without re-settlement funds are not admitted to Canada. The requirement for re-settlement funds is waived if the arriving immigrant has a guaranteed job waiting. But it is very unusual to be able to obtain a job from outside Canada before arrival. Most immigrants are not able to do that. If you’ve both been in school for 16 years, I am assuming you each have a bachelor degree. Before you go much further with your plans, you should each complete the questionnaire on this page. Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS) tool: skilled immigrants (Express Entry) To receive an invitation to apply as an immigrant to Canada, you must score 470 or more points. If you are scoring less than 470 points, you will need to enhance your qualifications. I also saw a reference to a teaching career. Be sure to research requirements to teach in Canada. Foreign trained teachers must complete upgrading before being licensed to teach in Canada. Here’s an example of the requirements from one province, Ontario.Internationally Educated Teachers You can find all the requirements to apply starting from this page. The Immigration Canada website has step-by-step instructions on how to apply. Applications can be made online.Immigrate to Canada Immigrate through Express Entry Be aware that Canada is currently in recession with very high unemployment so you should have more re-settlement funds than usual. It could be very difficult to find a job.

Zero. You both have 16 years of education which means bachelor degrees, no? You pretty much need master’s level education to get PR. If you did get an invitation to apply for PR you would not get PR because a family of two must provide proof of funds for $16,135 CAD. No ifs, ands or buts.  Proof of funds - Skilled immigrants (Express Entry)

I am sorry to say. Your chances are ZERO. The required minimum proof of funds is one of the requirements that will not be altered. The two of you are half ways there. An applicant plus on dependent requires a minimum “PoF” of $16.135. UNENCUMBERED. The number adjusted as needed. Usually upwards.

The answers that have been given are very correct. You have to have more than Bachelor’s degree if you want to get into Express Entry OR you have a CLB Level of 9 and above. Also, you will need money to support you while you are living in Canada. If you cannot show the finances, you will not qualify.
